languages.text: Дворяне и чернь, чьи сердца еще полнятся горечью от утраты родного мира и жаждой мести, собираются в ополчение и помогают колонии уничтожить супостатов.

The Rykadian nobles and commoners, their hearts still bitter with mourning for their lost homeworld and desire for vengeance, band together as a militia force and help the colony destroy the wicked invaders.
languages.original_text: Дворяне и чернь, чьи сердца еще полнятся горечью от утраты родного мира и жаждой мести, собираются в ополчение и помогают колонии уничтожить супостатов.

The Rykadian nobles and commoners, their hearts still bitter with mourning for their lost homeworld and desire for vengeance, band together as a militia force and help the colony destroy the wicked invaders.

languages.text: Los nobles y plebeyos de Rykad, afligidos aún por la amargura de perder su mundo y por las ansias de venganza, se unen en una milicia y ayudan a la colonia a destruir a los malignos invasores.
languages.original_text: The Rykadian nobles and commoners, their hearts still bitter with mourning for their lost homeworld and desire for vengeance, band together as a militia force and help the colony destroy the wicked invaders.

traits.locale_text: Los nobles y plebeyos de Rykad, afligidos aún por la amargura de perder su mundo y por las ansias de venganza, se unen en una milicia y ayudan a la colonia a destruir a los malignos invasores.

languages.text: ライカドの貴族と平民は、失われた母星への哀悼と復讐の念を胸に民兵として団結し、コロニーが邪悪な侵略者を滅ぼす手助けをする。
languages.original_text: The Rykadian nobles and commoners, their hearts still bitter with mourning for their lost homeworld and desire for vengeance, band together as a militia force and help the colony destroy the wicked invaders.

traits.locale_text: ライカドの貴族と平民は、失われた母星への哀悼と復讐の念を胸に民兵として団結し、コロニーが邪悪な侵略者を滅ぼす手助けをする。

languages.text: 莱卡德的贵族与平民充满了决心，他们渴望哀悼失去的家园，向他们的敌人复仇。他们联合起来，构成了民兵武装力量，协助殖民地消灭邪恶的侵略者。
languages.original_text: The Rykadian nobles and commoners, their hearts still bitter with mourning for their lost homeworld and desire for vengeance, band together as a militia force and help the colony destroy the wicked invaders.

traits.locale_text: 莱卡德的贵族与平民充满了决心，他们渴望哀悼失去的家园，向他们的敌人复仇。他们联合起来，构成了民兵武装力量，协助殖民地消灭邪恶的侵略者。

languages.text: Die Adligen und der Pöbel von Rykad trauern noch immer um ihre verlorene Heimatwelt. Die Gier nach Rache brennt in ihren Herzen. Sie schließen sich daher zu einer Miliz zusammen und helfen der Kolonie, die bösen Eindringlinge zu vernichten.
languages.original_text: The Rykadian nobles and commoners, their hearts still bitter with mourning for their lost homeworld and desire for vengeance, band together as a militia force and help the colony destroy the wicked invaders.

traits.locale_text: Die Adligen und der Pöbel von Rykad trauern noch immer um ihre verlorene Heimatwelt. Die Gier nach Rache brennt in ihren Herzen. Sie schließen sich daher zu einer Miliz zusammen und helfen der Kolonie, die bösen Eindringlinge zu vernichten.

languages.text: Révoltés par la perte de leur monde d'origine et assoiffés de vengeance, nobles et roturiers de Rykad se liguent au sein d'une milice pour aider la colonie à anéantir les envahisseurs tant honnis.
languages.original_text: The Rykadian nobles and commoners, their hearts still bitter with mourning for their lost homeworld and desire for vengeance, band together as a militia force and help the colony destroy the wicked invaders.

traits.locale_text: Révoltés par la perte de leur monde d'origine et assoiffés de vengeance, nobles et roturiers de Rykad se liguent au sein d'une milice pour aider la colonie à anéantir les envahisseurs tant honnis.

languages.text: Yüreklerinde yuvalarını kaybetmenin acısı hâlâ taze olan ve intikam arzusuyla tutuşan Rykadlı soylular ile sıradan yurttaşlar, askerî bir kuvvet olarak birlik olup koloninin menfur istilacıları yok etmesine yardım ediyorlar.
languages.original_text: The Rykadian nobles and commoners, their hearts still bitter with mourning for their lost homeworld and desire for vengeance, band together as a militia force and help the colony destroy the wicked invaders.
